```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```

```{r}
# libraries
s144 <- read.csv(here::here("data", "post_dspg", "s144_clean_v1.csv"))
nrow(s144)
```

### Average Response Length

```{r}
tmp <- s144 %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, q85) %>%
  group_by(id) %>%
  count() 
mean(tmp$n)
```
